channel.title: Colossus 742! 24/7 UP TIME! For the players, by a player!
channel.description:
[SIZE=7]COLOSSUS 742[/SIZE] [SIZE=7][FONT=Fixedsys]UP 24/7 DDOS PROTECTED! <3[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Website![/SIZE] [URL=http://"http://colossus742.com"]http://colossus742.com[/URL] [SIZE=4]Download! [/SIZE] [url=http://www.colossus742.com/downloads-.html]http://www.colossus742.com/downloads-.html[/url] [SIZE=4]Forums! [/SIZE] [url=http://forums.colossus742.com/phpbb3/index.php]http://forums.colossus742.com/phpbb3/index.php[/url]
Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now. This project is based around the idea of offering a RS2 feel, but making the game more enjoyable. I wanted to make a server that was for the players, opposed to what might be trending right now! Log in and give us a shot! Before I make a long speech 75% of you won't read, I'm just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom!
[spoil] [b]Fully functional Completionist Cape![/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JW6a.jpg[/img]
[b]New Models, Every item usable! [/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JWpQ.jpg[/img]
[b]WORKING EXCALIBUR (e) for those overload flasks!! :) [/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JWyF.jpg[/img]
[b] ALL WORKING SKILLS[/b] [b] 525 Graphics![/b] [IMG]http://puu.sh/92FDw.jpg[/img] [b]742 Graphics![/b] [IMG]http://puu.sh/92FCZ.jpg[/img]
[b]DOMINION TOWER WITH WORKING REWARDS![/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JWga.jpg[/img]
[b]FULLY WORKING SLAYER [/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JWFe.jpg[/img]
FULLY WORKING AURA'S! [img]http://puu.sh/8JXgj.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/8JXqa.jpg[/img]
[b]WORKING CASTLE WARS [/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JY73.jpg[/img]
[b]NEXT LEVEL PVP :)[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/8JXDH.jpg[/img] [/spoil]
Hello! If those pictures didn't pull you in, then.. I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server.
I'm currently making nothing from the server, so I'm paying everything through my own pocket. Which I don't mind at all! Donators are rewarded, however its not requested or pushed upon you.
Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I'm telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I'm IRL friends with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I'll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers.. I hope you will be among those players.
Thanks for all your time! Sorry if this post rambled and ran on a bit but I had to type this and gather the pictures in a rush! Leave a comment, Flame me or encourage it.. all chat is accepted. Anything to make my server in a better standing c:
[SIZE=5]5/24/14 NEW CLIENT- FIXED ALL BUGS[/SIZE] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8Z2VF.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=5]6/3/14 ADDED DUEL ARENA! NO DUPES![/SIZE]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9dr0t/dfcbae20c0.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url] [url=http://www.colossus742.com]www.colossus742.com[/url]

item.title: Colossus 742! 24/7 UP TIME! For the players, by a player!
item.dc:creator: @jordydragon jordydragon
item.description:
@jordydragon wrote:

Hello moparscape members!

I know this server has it to get a huge community! Because Alex is truly a good owner he knows his stuff. And if you need help he will always try to help you! In my eyes this is not a server like all other starting servers around! Keep it up Alex you can make it far. and i hope that alot of players will join because this server is great! So everyone come and play this server you will not regret it!

Sincerly,
Jordy aka jordydragon

Read full topic

item.title: Colossus 742! 24/7 UP TIME! For the players, by a player!
item.dc:creator: @alext1223 alext1223
item.description:
@alext1223 wrote:

[SIZE=7]COLOSSUS 742[/SIZE]
[SIZE=7][FONT=Fixedsys]UP 24/7 DDOS PROTECTED! <3[/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Website![/SIZE]
[URL=http://“http://colossus742.com”]http://colossus742.com[/URL]
[SIZE=4]Download! [/SIZE]
http://www.colossus742.com/downloads-.html
[SIZE=4]Forums! [/SIZE]
http://forums.colossus742.com/phpbb3/index.php

Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now.
This project is based around the idea of offering a RS2 feel, but making the game more enjoyable. I wanted to make a server that was for the players, opposed to what might be trending right now!
Log in and give us a shot!
Before I make a long speech 75% of you won’t read, I’m just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom!

[spoil]
Fully functional Completionist Cape!

New Models, Every item usable!

WORKING EXCALIBUR (e) for those overload flasks!!


ALL WORKING SKILLS
525 Graphics!

742 Graphics!

DOMINION TOWER WITH WORKING REWARDS!

FULLY WORKING SLAYER

FULLY WORKING AURA’S!

WORKING CASTLE WARS

NEXT LEVEL PVP

[/spoil]

Hello! If those pictures didn’t pull you in, then… I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server.

I’m currently making nothing from the server, so I’m paying everything through my own pocket. Which I don’t mind at all! Donators are rewarded, however its not requested or pushed upon you.

Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I’m telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I’m IRL friends with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I’ll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers… I hope you will be among those players.

Thanks for all your time!
Sorry if this post rambled and ran on a bit but I had to type this and gather the pictures in a rush!
Leave a comment, Flame me or encourage it… all chat is accepted.
Anything to make my server in a better standing c:

[SIZE=5]5/24/14 NEW CLIENT- FIXED ALL BUGS[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]6/3/14 ADDED DUEL ARENA! NO DUPES![/SIZE]
